archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.3.8b: b) be informed of who is collecting this information (e.g. by means of a privacy notice), how this information will be used, allowed to check its accuracy and be able to have their records corrected or removed
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
